13221.content:
You gasp as a warm breeze washes over you and your vision slowly begins to return. You shiver as you get up out of the melted puddle of water surrounding you. "Why is it so dark in here?" you groan as you use the thin shafts of light peeking through the walls and ceiling to find the door.

With a soft creak the flimsy door falls over as soon as you try to turn the knob and hits the ground with a thud. You gasp as you take a few steps forward into the light and marvel at the colossal city before you. All around you were towering buildings with futuristic designs and tons of billboards and signs. About the only thing that looked out of date was the ruins of the gas station basement you just climbed out of.

You walk up the steps leading to the parking lot to get a better view and nearly scream in shock. This really was the future...but it wasn't some sci-fi utopia like they envisioned during the fifties. Everything was advanced, but reeked of urban decay and pollution...even the midday sun could barely be seen through the thick cloud of smog pouring from nearby factories.

What do you do?
13221.title: Gas Runner

choices: The hover bike actually starts
The hover bike stalls and powers down
The hover bike sets off a loud beeping alarm
132212.content:
You begin walking down the sidewalk while looking around at the strange new world unfolding before you. Aside from a few flying hovercraft darting between the buildings above you and a few dirty vagrants stumbling about there wasn't any sign of life nearby. "Hopefully, I'm just in a bad part of town and the whole world doesn't look like this..." you say softly as you pass by an ancient rusted car with weeds poking through the hood.

After about twenty minutes you come to a small shanty town made from various bits of scrap and discarded junk. The only cover from the harsh outside world they had were flimsy wooden fences and bits of sheet metal draped over their tiny hovels. "Wow, this place is getting more depressing by the minute..." you whisper as you pass through.

Once you get to the other side you see a vast stretch of abandoned road lined with boarded up and crumbling buildings. In the distance you could see a high concrete wall cutting off access to the other streets covered in graffiti. You are about to turn back towards the shanty town when you noticed a hover bike parked off to the side of the road behind a broken wooden fence.

You doubted that the thing skill worked, but you were already tired of walking around so you hopped on and looked over the main control panel. There wasn't any slot for keys or even any buttons, just a hand-shaped panel and a steering device. "Okay then, here goes nothing..." you say nervously as you swipe your hand over the panel.

choices: Try to find your home
Try to find some famous old landmarks
Try to get a better view from the top of the towering skyscraper
1322121.content:
You gasp in excitement as the hover bike slowly hums to life and lifts off the ground. You pull the steering device gently back and the hover bike rises forward into the air. As it climbs higher you panic slightly while narrowly dodging a broken street lamp, careful not to fall or push too hard in any direction. "Okay, let's take things slowly..." you whisper to yourself as you soar over a collapsed hotel building.

You ease up on the steering device and take a brief moment to look around as the hover bike floats in place. You were still too low to the street to see over most of the newer buildings but you could tell that this futuristic city stretched for miles in all directions. If not for the fact that a towering skyscraper was nearby you could easily lose track of where the gas station was and get lost.

"Wow, this is really insane." you say as you resume flying upwards. When you get to the top of the tallest crumbling building you take another look around and gasp in amazement at all of the bright lights and factories dotting the smog choked landscape. "I need to find out where I am... or rather when I am. Everything is so different now... where do I go?"

13221213.content:
You decide to first get a good look at the surrounding buildings and roads, then plot a course to your next destination. You rise up above the towering skyscraper past several offices and cubicles until you arrived at the very top and come to a stop next to some sort of strange antenna. From here you could see that the city was divided into three main districts, each separated by walls.

The area you had come from was the largest and looked to be nothing but a mostly abandoned slum filled with old buildings and collapsed infrastructure. The area below you now was a slightly smaller business and residential district that had many shops, houses and markets stretching off towards the smog filled horizon. The final, smallest district was a tiny patch of green and blue in a large sea of rusted brown and faded gray. It had the tallest buildings and was by far the most futuristic looking, though it didn't come close to the size of the two other districts.

"Looks like all of the fat cats and their corporations live it up while the average joes and poor people are stuck in these less developed places." you wonder aloud to yourself. "Guess the future still has a lot of the problems of the present and a ton more they must have created along the way." You sigh as you take another quick look around and try to figure out where to head to first. Each district had its own pros and cons, but you eventually make up your mind and fly off to...

A car is too slow, the only way you'll make it is to travel there by plane
Call the cops, this has to be all kinds of illegal
1343.content:
You can't resist the thought of taking your clothes off for the camera and slowly begin stripping. You're like one of those women on Girls Gone Wild, except much more desperate, stupid, and much more hungry for any kind of attention. Also, its doubtful you'll get a nice hat or shirt for whipping out your ta-tas for whoever watches the film in this crappy thing. Oh well, too late to go back now... unless you go back to the last chapter and select a different option that saves your dignity. You can always do that, but its much more fun for the horny people at home if you just stick to this option and follow it through to the (probably boderline pornographic) end. Anyway, you pop your top off and slide down your pants. You dance around a bit in your underwear and then take off your bra and finally your panties. After a few minutes of doing erotic and horrifying (not to mention embaressing) things with the various products lining the shelves you put your clothes back on and head behind the counter to finish up your shift.


"That was fun, maybe I'll do it again sometime... but I should probably grab the film from that camera before I leave. It would suck if it got leaked to the internet or something..." You say as you head to the back room to grab your extremely NSFW recording. You open the door and see your manager putting away a few boxes while cursing that he is starting to get too old for this. "Hey bossman! I uh, was... showing off for the camera earlier today and was wondering if I could have that film, please? I don't want it to fall into the wrong hands... I might look... kinda silly..." You say with a weak laugh as your manager begins grinning. "You mean the little nude dance you did where you rubbed gummi bears all over your body? That what we're talking about?" He says while giving you a somewhat smug smile. "I've never seen anyone do THAT with a can of Pringles... it was quite the show, let me tell ya!" Your face instantly lost a shade of color as you realized exactly how "silly" your lack of common sense has made you look... RIGHT in front of your boss, no less!


"Uh... um... yeah. Look, that was stupid of me, okay? Can you just give me the tape and promise not to tell anyone about this?" You beg as your face begins glowing bright red. "Oh, I won't tell anyone..." Your manager says with a fresh smile. "Oh good." You think to yourself as you breathe a sigh of relief. Your naughty secret was safe. "Y'see, I ALREADY sent it in to this years Adult Entertainment Expo to be screened in front of a live audence... it might even make it onto national tv!" He finishes as he goes back to stacking boxes. You sink to the floor and lay there for a few minutes to contemplate just how screwed you are. After a little while that starts to get old so you decide to try and retrieve the tape before it gets shown. Wasting no time you...
1343.title: Oh sure, no way this could EVER screw you over...

choices: Buy a ticket to New York
Buy a ticket to Las Vegas
13432.content: You rush out of the gas station, jump in your car, and head home to grab your life savings and embark on an epic quest to save your dignity from your own stupidity. Its like some kinda greek epic, only lamer. You arrive home and waste no time saying hi to your mom as you run into your room, murder Mr. Devlin the piggy bank in cold blood (you named it, not me), and scoop up as much of his green and silver entrails as possible before running back out the door. "ByemomIgottagocatchaplaneitsalongstoryI'llcallyouIpromise!" You shout as you get back in the car and drive to the airport 20 miles outside of town. "Oh man its getting late, I better hurry!" You groan as you head over to the front desk to buy a ticket. "Where to?" The kindly young woman behind the counter asks as she types on a computer. "I'd like a ticket to... to... uh oh..." You groan as you slap yourself in the head. You didn't know where the AEE was being held... and the last few flights were due to head out in just a few minutes. "You might want to hurry up and decide dear, the planes will be leaving soon... and they're the last flights until tomorrow." The woman says as you struggle to think of where an event like AEE would be held. Guess you'll have to take a shot in the dark and hope you get it right...
13432.title: Where were you going again?

choices: You tell him about the creep next to you.
You put on your girlie charm-"how would you like to fly solo with me?"
134322.content: You have always wanted to go to Los Vegas. The lights are always on and all the gambling and shows are a lure that makes you feel all manner of thrills inside. You get inside the airplane and find a seat next a skinny young man of forty years old with a fishy type of after shave that makes you want to puke. You did not notice the smell until the plane had already taken off and they posted the put on your seat belts moniker. You are seated next to this creep for what seems like an eternity. Then from out of nowhere comes a male stewardess, there offering to meet your every need.
134322.title: Buy a ticket to Las Vegas

choices: Try a direct confrontation
Try to sneak in and steal the tape back
Make a terrorist threat
1343222.content:
Having apparently learned jackshit fucking NOTHING from the series of events that landed you here in the first place you decide to seduce the steward and join the mile high club on your trip to Vegas inside the tiny little airplane bathroom. "Hand me my bra." you say as the man fastens his belt back on his pants. "Sure just a sec." he replies as the buckle clicks into place. "That was really something, the thing your did with your right index finger, front teeth and left ear was incredible, where did you learn to do that?"

You let out a giggle as he hands you your clothes back and begin getting dressed. "Let's just say I've been in front of a camera before." you reply, apparently trying to sound like the biggest slut possible (which, I'm not gonna judge here, may full well be your intentions at this point). "Speaking of which I lost some... footage of myself I need back before AEE begins, do you know anything that could help me?"

The man pauses to think and then snaps his fingers. "Would that be the video of you in the gas station with the can of Pringles and-" You instantly cut him off by grabbing his shirt and nearly shouting where could you find the tape at now. "The guy in a black coat and sunglasses up in first class showed it to me while I poured him a drink, he has it." the poor man chokes out as you nearly strangle him in excitement. "THANK YOU!" you shout as you run off to confront the man, leaving the poor steward sitting on the floor confused as the other passengers stare at him while the bathroom door slowly slides shut behind him.
1343222.title: You Must Learn Slower Than Rocks...

choices: The monopoly guy
The salesman guy
The fat guy
13432221.content:
You rush into the first class cabin just as the pilot announces your descent onto the Vegas runway. "Crap fucking shit!" you curse under your breath as make your way down the aisle. "If that fucker gets off the plane with my video I'll never find him, I need to hurry!"

To your horror you see no less than three men who all fit the description of your target. The first was an older gentleman with a monopoly mustache and top hat along with black aviator sunglasses and an expensive black fur coat. The second was a younger guy that looked like a car insurgence salesman on crack with a wide grin, thin sunglasses and a black dress coat and tie. Finally, there was a fat guy with a thick black coat that barely covered his gray t-shirt and exposed stomach. He wasn't wearing sunglasses on his face, but did have a pair hanging from his shirt pocket.

The plane touches down on the runway as you move forward to make your choice.
13432221.title: Bad Time For A Threesome

choices: Home and Gardens
Teen People
Shonen Jump
135.content: You twirl your hair as you look around the store, desperate for something to do. After a few minutes you notice the magazine rack at the back of the store. It was too early for the new issues to be in, but there was still probably something worth reading. You check to make sure no one is about to come in before steping out from behind the counter and heading back there to grab something. There was a pretty big selection, even if most of the magazines were about tools, cars, and hunting. Finally your eyes fall upon a brand new issue of...
135.title: Something to read

choices: Call someone and find out what is going on!
Step outside and try to get home before you end up trapped here!
Just make yourself some hot chocolate and get back to work. Whiner.
1351.content: You flick through a few pages of the magazine while admiring all the wonderful outdoor pictures. Most of these must have been taken during the spring, judging from all the beautiful flowers and plants. "I always did love the spring..." You say to yourself as you shiver slightly from a cold chill. "Jeez, its getting kinda cool in here... who touched the AC?" You continue reading for about 4 minutes before the freezing air starts getting to you. You close the magazine, put it back, turn around, and let out a surprised gasp. Just outside the window, in what must have surely been 90 degree weather, was a massive snowstorm. The ground and your car were already covered in about 2 inches... and there was no sign that this sudden blizzard would stop any time soon...
1351.title: Snowed in

choices: Head towards a house with smoke coming out of the chimney
Head towards the nearly submerged diner up ahead
13512.content: You quickly run outside and get inside your car, shivering as ou turn it on and wipe the snow from your shoulders. "I-I'm really n-not d-dressed for t-this k-kind of weather..." You moan as you turn the key in the ignition and pull away from the gas station as another couple of inches cover the ground. You immediately head towards town, but in less than a minute your car slows to a stop as the snow piles around it. Pretty soon you'll be trapped here if you don't leave right now. With a deep breath you shove open the door and jump out onto the freezing white tundra that had been your home town mere minutes before. The icy cold stings your bare exposed skin and blows through your clothing, chilling you to the bone. Up ahead you can make out a few buildings in the pale haze of snowflakes. Best get moving before you freeze to death...
13512.title: Snowscape

choices: You wake up in a hot bath
You wake up in a warm bed
135121.content: The piled up snow had almost completely covered the door, but a light on inside the upstairs window told you there were still people at home. As fast as you can you march over to the front of the house and throw a snowball right below the window. A few seconds pass and no one comes to answer... "No! NO! Oh please god let someone find me...!" You say as the cold becomes too much for you. A dizziness overtakes your head as the window above flies open and a young boy peeks outside. "Hello? Hello? Did someone just- oh my gosh! Miss! Hey Miss!" He calls as you look up to see your savior. "Grandma, come quick! There's a lady out there!" He yells as you sink to your knees and feel the icey numbness overtake you. The last thing you hear before you black out is the sound of an older woman calling for someone named Robert.
135121.title: Just chill, okay?

choices: You are woken up by an elderly woman
You are woken up by a man who appears to be in his late forties or early fifties
1351212.content: Your head felt foggy as you stir from your peaceful slumber to find yourself in a tiny bedroom with little more than a small desk with a lamp and radio on it sitting in the corner. What immediately caught your eye, however, was the two, maybe three inches of space between the snow and the snowflake dotted sky visible just outside the frosted over window. You took a few moments to reflect on what happened and how you got here... the last thing you remembered was passing out in the snow in front of a house, probably this one. Your whole body felt numb, but also had a creeping warm feeling overtaking it from the heavy blankets gently wrapped over you. You try thinking for a few more minutes but it isn't long before you drift back off to sleep...
1351212.title: Mmm... toasty!

135122.content: You decide to ignore the house and rush over to the diner, praying that you find a way inside before the snow covers it. Only about half a foot of the front window is still visible above the snow by the time you make it over and its getting covered pretty fast. In a panic you smash the window with your foot and land inside on a pile of broken glass and snow. You groan in pain as your side and lower back start bleeding a little, though you had bigger problems to worry about. There was no power and the entire diner was empty. You struggle to get up in the freezing cold, but the pain from your injuries makes it difficult. By the time you manage to stand up the shattered window is completely covered in a fresh mountain of snow that was leaking into the diner as the icey storm ravaged outside. You were trapped, alone and cold, in the middle of a new ice age and stuck in a place where no one could probably even get to in this nightmarish weather. You try to look around and keep your mind focused, but the pain in your glass inflicted cuts and scratches combined with the chill soon forced you back to the floor. You tried one last time to get up, only to feel a warm numbness slowly overtake you. You closed your eyes to take a short nap... and never opened them. It would be days before an explorer would find your dead body while looking for supplies. Even in your frozen tomb it still appeared as if you were only sleeping...
135122.title: FREEZE! Ha ha...

choices: An eskimo
A polar bear
13513.content: "And 1,2,3, 4 marshmallows!" You say cheerfully as you wrap yourself in a nice warm electric blanket. "Nothing like some hot coco and a blanket on chilly days like these." You are just getting comfortable when the front door opens and piles of snow flood in. "Damn, I was just starting to relax..." You say as you take a sip from your hot chocolate and tearfully pull away your snug blanket. Seems you've actually got a customer in this crazy weather... but who would be out in a snowstorm just to get gas?
13513.title: "You're letting in cold air..."

choices: "My car. What else?"
"The giant snow ball, of course. Say hi to the wife and kids!"
135131.content: "Well, that figures..." You say as you ring up the bag of chips and lottery tickets the snug-looking man has placed on the counter. "You sure look warm and cozy in that coat..." You say as you shoot him a death glare. "By the way, how the hell did you even get here...?" The eskimo gives you a confused look and replies...
135131.title: Must be from outta town...

choices: He tries to barter with you offering fresh fish.
He pays like a normal person.
1351311.content:
You look outside to the parking lot past the flurry of snow to see what appeared to be a heavily armored snow plow. "Ah" you say as if that explained everything, but in reality it only raised more questions. The eskimo stared at you expectantly It was a little creepy. "My stuff?" he asked.

"Oh yeah" you responded clicking the buttons on your screen to ring in the order. "Seven eighty five" you tell the man.
1351311.title: "My car. What else?"

choices: "I'm sorry, but I'll need some cash."
"I'm sorry, but that still isn't enough fish."
"Red snapper? Hot damn! Sold!"
13513111.content: The man takes out a large wallet and pulls out two yellowtail and a bass and tosses them on the counter, where they flop once or twice in a futile attempt to get away. "Sorry, I don't have any change on me right now, will this cover it?" he asks as he puts his hand up to block the bass from falling off the side. "I'm uh, not sure I can accept this..." you reply as you look down at the wriggling fish. "Aw, come on. If anything I'm giving you a nice tip with these guys... would you take it if I threw in a red snapper and some tuna as well?"
13513111.title: This Payment Smells Fishy...Cause It Is...

choices: Cook the fish
Save the fish for later
See if any of the fish are magical and able to grant wishes
135131113.content:
You take the fish and toss them in the freezer, that is, you throw them on a fresh pile of snow behind the counter and wave goodbye to the eskimo man as he drives off into the blizzard. "Well, now I've got a lot of fresh fish...I wonder what I could use them for." you say to yourself as you watch them flop about.

You look outside the windows at the piling snow, clearly it wasn't going to let up anytime soon. Maybe you should save the fish for later in case you come across any more eskimos who want to trade...or you could just cook them all and eat them now. Decisions...decisions...
135131113.title: I Got The Fishes, Bishes!

choices: It's a group of hunters
It's a guy on a modified snowmobile
It's a big polar bear
1351311131.content:
You make a small fire with a trashcan and some garbage and begin roasting one of the fish. You never were the best cook, but you could at least make some fish sticks or something. All you were really lacking was some tarter sauce and a napkin... ah well. At least this food was fresh and not stuffed to the ass in preservatives like most of the other junk in this place. So long as you don't burn it this fish might even taste good.

Just as you finish grilling up your lunch and get ready to put it on a plate you notice something walking up through the mountain of snow that used to be the parking lot. It was still pretty hard to see outside even as the snow began to let up a bit but you could make out something strange approaching the front door. All you could tell was that whatever it is, it sure is big...
1351311131.title: Interrupted Lunch Break

choices: Head to the back room to greet them
Lock the back room door until you know if they're a threat
Grab a weapon to defend yourself if you need to
13513111311.content:
As the figure outside got closer it started to break apart until you realized it wasn't some large creature but several smaller ones, all humanoid in appearance and carrying various long objects that looked like spears and rifles. You walk over to the door to greet them but the packed snow made it impossible to open the door with breaking it. "Well shoot, this isn't good..." you think to yourself as one of the figures outside comes into view near the front window.

He was an older guy with a bushy mustache and a thick wool hat and was carrying a machete which he lightly tapped on the glass to call you over. You waved and tried to give him a smile, but it was clear his group wasn't getting inside unless they brought a shitload of snow shovels or a giant stove on wheels. The man smiles back and points to the door leading to the back room behind you, then it hits you.

The boss had an emergency ladder installed on the outer rear of the store in case of flooding or other natural disasters since he was a bit paranoid and a survivalist. You'd think he could also afford to pay you a livable wage with all the crap he wastes money on, but in this case his frivolous spending actually came in useful. You make a mental note never to tell him he was right for once and nod to the man outside the window.

You then head to the back room and stand on the table to unlatch the small roof hatch with a broom and head back out to tell the guys outside they now had a way in. The lead hunter nods in appreciation as he disappears from the window and heads around to the side of the store and disappears from sight. Your first instinct is to greet him only to begin wondering what kind of people they might be. They seemed friendly enough, but what if they were criminals... or worse? Should you really let them just walk in?

As you hear footsteps climbing up the ladder outside you frantically begin planning your next move....
13513111311.title: Always Have A Backup Plan

choices: "I've never ridden a snowball before, let me on that thing!"
"Nah, sorry... the reader wants me to stay here and do boring stuff..."
1351312.content: He points out the window at a woman and two young children stuck on a giant snowball next to one of the pumps outside. They wave cheerfully as you nerviously wave back at them. "Ah, huh... okay... that'll be uh, $6.79 please." You say as he takes out a wallet he made from a polar bear pelt and hands you a ten. "Keep the change then, now if you'll excuse me we really must be going. We're on our way to disneyland." You stare at him for a few moments before replying. "Yeah, yeah... okay... have fun with that..." He gives you a smile as he opens the door, letting in another cold gust of air. "You know... theres an extra seat on the snowball if you need a ride south." Its not every day that a strange man offers you a ride on a snowball...
1351312.title: Do you wish to ride the mighty land snowball?

135132.content: With a mighty roar the pale behemoth lumbers over and knocks you across the room with one of its powerful claws. "No...! Why is this happening...?!" You moan as blood pours down your face and neck. You can only scream in pain and fear as it moves over to where you now lay defenceless with hunger gleaming in its savage eyes. It takes the monster only a few minutes to messily devour you, after which it grabs a Coka Cola from the freezer and heads back outside to look for more prey.
135132.title: Jesus Christ, its A GODDAMN POLAR BEAR!

choices: The manga author interview
The free trading card
The newest chapter of your favorite series
1353.content:
You pick up a copy that already had the plastic wrap covering it torn open and ripped it the rest of the way off. "It's not like my boss can get mad at me for reading already damaged merchandise." you say with a light chuckle as you open the action packed book to the table of contents. Each issue had a lot of cool stuff to enjoy but this particular one was jam packed with extra content for readers to enjoy.

You first considered going straight to the manga chapters but a few other things caught you eye as well. Apparently, this issue had a special exclusive five page interview with your favorite manga author where they discuss their main inspirations and techniques. Neat! There was also a free trading card included in the back, which would be perfect for your collection. After taking a moment to decide what to read first you turn the pages and head for...
1353.title: All For Only Five Bucks!

choices: Have a look around the store
Try on some of the sunglasses
You bought a newspaper this morning, now might be a good time to read it
Fall asleep, if someone needs anything they can just wake you up
Play some games on your Nintendo DS
14.content: You rub your eyes and yawn as you try to remember why you not only took a job at a gas station, but the night shift on top of it. "Jesus, what was I thinking?" You groan as you look out the window at the empty parking lot. "The only thing worse about this job than the pay is the hours, and I just HAD to pass up the day shift..." Clearly, your lack of sleep at this early hour has left you pretty grumpy... maybe you should try to do something to pass the time.
14.title: The graveyard shift, huh?

choices: A deed to a plot of land just outside town
A rubix cube
An ancient book of untold evil
141.content: You head out from behind the counter and begin walking around the gas station looking at all the different brands of crappy food and sugar filled energy drinks for sale. Nothing out of the ordinary and certainly nothing interesting. A yawn escapes your lips as you head back up front to resume your job but something catches your eye as you pass by the snack rack. You reach out to find...
141.title: I spy with my little eye...

choices: A large ranch out in the countryside
A nice mansion nestled in the woods outside of town
A casino and hotel... built over a native american burial ground...
1411.content: You grab a worn piece of paper and unroll it to find that it is a deed to a plot of land just outside town. "Wow, I can't believe I found this here! Who would leave something like this just lying around a gas station?" you wonder aloud as you roll the deed back up and put it away. "Ah well, their loss is my gain I guess..." With that you head home and show the deed to your family, who all agree that the best course of action is to up and move now that they don't have to settle for a house in this shitty neighborhood anymore. The only question is, what kind of property is the deed actually for?
1411.title: Indeed!

choices: A herd of dinosaurs
A pack of living vehicles
A group of monster girls/boys
14111.content:
As it turns out the deed was for a large thousand acre ranch out in the beautiful yet isolated countryside. The place had just about everything: a large three story house with six bedrooms, two large barns to keep livestock in, wide open fields full of beautiful flowers, a lush forest that stretched off into the horizon and even a large garden in the backyard. The whole place was nice big slice of heaven on earth.

"Wow, this place looks amazing!" you say excitedly as your family drives up the long narrow driveway where a man was waiting for you in front of the main residence. He waves you over with a smile and soon you are all seated on the front porch sipping lemonade and snacking on sandwitches. The man introduces himself as Slim, the primary ranch hand and groundskeeper who keeps things running from day to day.

As you are all talking two more people drop by to greet you on their way to the market to buy some goods, a short chubby blonde woman in overalls named Louise and a fat older man with grey hair at his temples named Garth. Louise was the gardener and mechanic while Garth was a veterinarian and caregiver who tended to the livestock. Both chatted a while before disappearing in an old pickup truck down the driveway as Slim ushered you all inside your new home.

"Wow, this is all pretty amazing." you say as you take a seat on the couch in the living room in front of a wide flatscreen tv. "By the way, Slim, I forgot to ask you. What exactly do you raise out here anyway? This place is over an hours drive from the nearest city, surely you don't raise many animals out here?" Slim laughed as he walked over to the window facing the north field and pulled open the blinds. "Well, why don't y'all see for yourself? You're the new owners after all." You gasp in surprise as you see...
14111.title: Home On The Range...

choices: Do as he says and go introduce yourself
Demand an explenation before you do anything else
Wait for your family to join you outside and ask their opinion on the situation
141113.content:
Out in the backyard was a group of over a dozen strange monster creatures. Some had wings and claws, others had scales and fangs and a few even appeared to be based on plants or undead! None of them looked truly monstrous, however, more like half human hybrid creatures. What you figured was a harpy, for example, looked like a perfectly average teenage girl except for her feathered arms, talon hands and birdlike facial markings. It was all kind of surreal.

"Are those monsters... our livestock?" you ask in a shocked tone as Slim nods. Your family then begins to crowd around the window to stare in amazement as Slim leads you over to the back door. "Of course, little lady. This isn't your normal everyday ranch, which is why I need to talk with you for a second." he says in a hushed tone as he follows you outside. "This place is special, secret. I don't think I'll need to tell you much, you're a smart girl, but I want you to go meet your new friends before I explain everything."

You take a quick glance over at your new "livestock" and then back to Slim...
141113.title: Weeb Farm

choices: The Necro-nom-nom-bicon or whatever the fuck it was, the Evil Dead thing...
50 Shades Of Black
The Bible (This choice brought to you by the online atheist community.)
1413.content: You hold up the book to the dim light and it emits a sinister glow as it shivers in your hand. Clearly, this was some kind of evil tome of terrible darkness... but WHICH evil tome was it?
1413.title: Someone Call Ash Williams...

choices: You must destroy it
Take it home for now
Read it like a dumbass
14132.content: You now hold in your hands the dreaded tome 50 Shades Of Black, a sinister catalogue of vile spells, evil demons, horrible blood magic and all the possible ways that you don't do BDSM. Its darkness is far too much for one mortal mind to comprehend, but you alone are burdened with the curse of owning it for the time being. You shiver as you try to think of what you could possibly do with a book this diabolical and poorly written.
14132.title: INNER GODDESSSSSS!!!

choices: Nothing goes wrong, you return to the shop after a job well done.
A hell of a lot goes wrong, in the way of flames.
141321.content:
Quickly, you grab a lighter and run outside, tossing the book away from you as you set the flames upon the evil tome. Ahhh, safe at last. You sit there and watch as the fire burns away at the gas station. Fire... gas station... hmmm...

Screw it. What could go wrong?
141321.title: You must destroy it

choices: Run, you idiot!
Save the other people in the gas station.
Just stay in there.
1413212.content:
As you walk back to the gas station, a strong odor of smoke hit your nostrils. That's when you start to notice that the place is setting on fire!

Oh, crap! you thought to yourself. What have I done?

What do you do?
1413212.title: A hell of a lot goes wrong, in the way of flames.

choices: Shiny black movie action hero sunglasses
Pink heart-rimed sunglasses
Generic cheap sunglasses
142.content: You step out from behind the counter and walk over to the sunglasses display. "I could really use a new pair of shades since I sat on my old ones..." You say as you turn the display around to look at all the different types and colors. Finally, you see a pair you like and reach out to grab...
142.title: New pair of shades

choices: Leave this crappy place and see if it'll go up in flames too...
Put the glasses back and get back to work
See what happens if you put on a different pair of sunglasses
1421.content: You put on the move hero sunglasses and begin walking away from the display when it suddenly erupts into a firey explosion that rocks the whole store. "Holy fuck bunnies!" You yell in surprise as you turn around and look at the devastation. "Oh my god... my boss is gonna kill me!" You groan as you walk up to the smoking crater where the sunglasses stand used to be. Then the front counter explodes in a similar fashion right behind you. You turn back around with a shocked expression as you look at the gaping hole in the side of the store. "Just... wha..." You mumble as your mind tries to piece together just what the hell is going on.
1421.title: These must have belonged to Micheal Bay...

choices: Go walk away from a meat packing factory to make yourself a midnight snack!
Take off the glasses and get the hell out of there!
14211.content: You step outside and slowly walk away from the gas station like a movie star badass. A few seconds pass before the entire facility goes up in a massive fireball that ignites the pumps, causing a few more smaller explosions to go off. Even from a relatively safe distance away you can feel the immense heat from your destroyed former place of work. "Woah... awesome..." You say in utter amazement as pillars of smoke rise into the night sky. Well, now you're jobless, but have a pair of explody shades...
14211.title: Yep. *FWOOOOOOOSH!*

choices: "I shall now become a superheroine!"
"I shall now burn all the places that displease me! All of them shall fall!"
142111.content: The factory burns to a fine crisp as thousands of hotdogs begin raining down from the sky. "Good thing I got buns!" You say cheerfully as you catch a hotdog and chow down. Truely, this is an amazing gift you've been given and should only be used for good... or you could abuse the hell out of it for fun and profit! Just think, what would Jesus do? Well... he'd... probably just find a way to heal people through explosions... but what WOULD he do if he were an irresponsible chick with explosive eyewear?
142111.title: Weenie rain! (No, not like THAT you perverts!)

1421111.content:
As Andrea (she has a name now), walked down the road, she continued thinking about what she should do next.

“Oh I know!! Since I have the action superhero shades, why not become a superhero! But how??”

After about two miles of walking she came across a mysteriously abandoned strip mall. (Don't ask me how it got abandoned, okay? Damned literary license!!) As she got closer she could see that the mall contained a gun and military surplus store, a gym AND an electronics store. She walked up to the gym to see if she could talk to somebody about joining up. She peered through the window and saw no one was there, but a light was on near the back. So she knocked on the window to see if she could get someone's attention. The she tried pressing the buzzer. No response. Then for the heck of it she pulled the door handle and the door swung open. She walked inside and headed toward the light in the back of the room which looked as if it were coming from some type of office.

“Hello?? Is anybody-”

No one was there. She began exploring the rest of the building. Besides the office, there appeared to be some locker/shower rooms and near the very back was the storeroom. She walked inside to find that it was nearly crammed to capacity with pallets upon pallets of protein powders and sports supplements. Near the very back were 20 or 30 cases of an experimental female growth formula marked “TO BE THROWN AWAY” And next to them were 3 pallets of a highly illegal brand of steroids. Along with the brand new shipment of weights and bars, there was enough equipment to keep this gym running for the next 3 years.

“I guess problem one just solved itself!!” Andrea thought with a grin.



EIGHT MONTHS LATER.....

“498, 499, 500!!”

Andrea dropped the 450 lb. dumbbells she was using with a loud CLANG and walked over to the posing wall in nothing but her microscopic thong. She then did a double-bicep pose and watched with a combination of pride and arousal as her biceps bulged to their full 24 ½ inch size. The 5 foot 2 inch, scrawny, barely a B cup girl who had entered the building on that fateful night was gone forever. In her place stood a 6 foot 6 inch tall, 345 lb. 86 GGGG cup super-amazon. Andrea decided to turn the strip-mall in her new home/headquarters. She knocked down the adjoining walls to both sides of the gym and went about the process of making herself just short of being completely superhuman. She enrolled in several on line universities and got master's degrees in mechanical, electrical and electronics engineering, biochemistry, criminology, law enforcement, and forensics. With the electronics equipment, and thanks to the Internet, she was able to create her own set of surveillance gear and gadgetry to use whenever she answered calls for help. She became an expert on every weapon in the gun store, including their proper care and maintenance. After doing proper research on the expired growth formula, she learned that combining them with the steroids only served to exponentially increase their potency and effectiveness. The only “negative” side-effect was that it also made the formula completely addictive. Which wasn't really a problem because Andrea got off on watching her body grow larger and more powerful. To mask her location and identity she scrambled all out-going calls and received her missions through her business she called the “Mighty Maid Cleaning service”

While the cleaning service was a legit and functional, she really worked as a female mercenary for hire under her new name “Lucy Cage”. She would pose as a ditzy, female bodybuilder/stripper to get close her targets and then gather whatever information was required. She discovered that her huge muscles and almost inhuman strength had gotten her out of almost as many tight spots as her massive breasts had. And of course her signature piece of equipment, the thing that she never was found without was her black shades.

Just then someone pressed the door buzzer in the gym. Who was it?
1421111.title: "I shall now become a superheroine!"

You gasp in shock and horror as your clothes begin burning away in the vortex of fire. Strangely, the fire didn't seem to damage the nearby environment or even feel hot, but you were so busy freaking out you barely even noticed. As the inferno slowly died down in a cloud of pink smoke you found yourself standing fully nude in the empty gas station with a bewildered expression on your face.

You gaze down at your naked body and see that your skin is now bright pink with a warm red aura radiating off of it and your flesh is covered in strange glowing tattoos. In addition to that you also now had fangs, long ruby-red claws, pitch-black horns jutting from the top of your head... and a thin pointed tail. You feel so embarrassed and afraid that you almost cry, but quickly manage to compose yourself. If a customer came in and saw you like this there would be no telling what could happen. You struggle to keep from panicking as you quickly try to think of what to do next.

You take a pair of average looking sunglasses and put them on to see how you look. You go to open your pocket makeup case when something catches your eye outside. Across the street in the dim fog of the early morning you could swear you see a ghostly figure staring off into the woods. You take the glasses off and rub your eyes before looking back outside. All you could see now was the darkness of the distant treeline leading off into the nearby forest and an empty road.

"Wow, I must be getting sleep deprived if I'm starting to see shit." you groan as you go to put the sunglasses back. You feel a chill run down your spine as you turn your gaze back to the outside. You couldn't see anything, but it felt almost like someone was watching you. Things were really starting to take a creepy turn and you began feeling a little scared... what do you do?

Oh Garfield, as long as you continue to hate Mondays with such a passion I shall continue to enjoy reading about your lazy escapades." You say as you laugh, still ignoring the all-important front page. Finally, after wasting half an hour laughing at the weekly funnies you turn back to the main page as you sit the newspaper down on the counter. The bold text of the important story on page one catches your eye and you read on to find out that...

the old lady is stil there, and has fallen asleep.
1431.content:
You almost chortle at the words--deranged serial killer. Is there any other kind, you wonder. After finishing that bag of Salt & Vinegar chips, you look out at the islands and noticed an old lady in a beat up Oldsmobile pull up, No way could she be the one. Hiking out to put her gas in you notice a bunch of bags in the back seat.

Being the kind and helpful person you are, you ask, "How much?"

"Ten bucks worth, son," she says in her quirky little old lady voice.

While pumping gas, with nothing else to do, your eyes scan the contents of the bags, and notice some long items poking through at least one of them. You decide it must be a hoe.

Your stomach starts giving you grief. Gas? Now? But then maybe it's not. After setting the gas nozzle on automatic, you run back to the bathroom. real quick like, except it takes longer than you expected.

When you get back to the island,

A massive puddle of gas was beginning to form around the womans feet, if she hadn't been leaning against the side of the car asleep she probably would have fallen and broke a hip or something by now. "Oh crap! Oh crap! I'm gonna get fired for this!" You groan as you quickly run over and turn the pump off. "$234.88..." You moan as you read the total displayed on the meter. "With probably over $200 worth going to waste..." You look back over at the woman, who is still asleep. "Maybe I can clean all of this up before she wakes up." You say softly as you stare up at the bright full moon hanging in the sky overhead while contemplating your options.

Try to hide and stay out of sight
143121.content:
"Lady, wake up." I shouted at the woman, but she didn't move. I walked up to her and gave her shoulder a gentle shake, but still there was no response from the woman.

I felt wetness seeping into my shoes, and I remembered the gas nozzle. I took care of that and looked down at the ground. Oh my god, the puddle of gas was mixing with blood. My eyes slowly went back to the old woman and that's when I realized she was dead.

A knife was sticking out of her partially slashed throat. I moaned, shaking with fear. How could this have happened? It had to be the serial killer, but where was he now? My heart was pounding as I looked around the yard. So many shadows, so many places to hide. He could be anywhere. What chance did I have, what should I do?
143121.title: Wake her up and tell her what happened

Stay here and do your job like a good little drone
1432.content: You read the ad for the new circus in town eagerly and check the date printed at the bottom of the page. They would still be in town for 2 more nights, but its highly likey tickets were sold out at this point. Its a shame too, the acts looked killer... with goth clowns, cultist acrobats, and a whole horde of face paint wearing freaks. You checked your watch... only 20 minutes until the next show... and the place it was being held were the fairgrounds just outside of town, maybe a ten minute drive from here. Its doubtful your boss would like you leaving and you might not even be able to get in, but how often will you get a chance to visit a circus this kick ass?
1432.title: A midnight show

choices: Sign the contract
Try to find a person who will sell you a ticket
Try to sneak in
14321.content:
You lock up the gas station and get in your car as the moon climbs high into the sky. "I'm not gonna miss this, no way!" you say as you pull out of the parking area and head down the road. In just under ten minutes you arrive at the fairgrounds and pull up into one of the only free parking spaces left. You checked your watch and then headed over to the ticket booth, if you wanted to catch the show you'd need to hurry up.

As you walk up to the ticket master he lets out a groan while turning the page of his newspaper. "Sorry kid, the show is sold out for tonight. Come back tomorrow." he says as he shoos you away with his hand. "Hey, I'm not a kid and I just left my job early to get here on time! Isn't there any way I could get a ticket?" you ask hopefully as you lean closer to the window.

The man frowns and takes off his top hat. After reaching inside it he pulls out a stack of paper and slides it up to you. "Sign the contact and I'll give you a ticket." he says as he pulls a red pen from his coat. You glance down at your watch again, you had about five minutes before it was showtime. "What is the contract for?" you ask as you pick it up.

"Read it and find out." the man says rudely as he puts his top hat back on. You were becoming a bit frustrated as you quickly glanced over it and flipped through a few pages. "I don't have time to read everything!" you protest as you squint at the tiny print on the papers in front of you. "Then don't." the man says as he turns the page of his newspaper again. You really wanted to punch this guy...but the show would start any minute now!
14321.title: Ticket Please...

choices: Try to sneak out
Return to the ticket master
Stay put and wait for ticket guy's boss to find you
143211.content:
You groan in frustration as you take the red pen and sign your name where the man specifies. Your hand hurts as the ink spills onto the paper and your heart begins to beat faster, but you brush it all off as excitement. "Here, now give me my ticket!" you shout as you slam the pen down on top of the contract.

"Here you go. Enjoy the show." the man says flatly as he pulls a ticket from his sleeve and hands it to you. "My boss will find you after the show, so don't go running off anywhere." You give him a glare and run towards the main tent where you hand your ticket off to the big clown guy who points you to your seat.

You buy a bag of popcorn from a vendor and get ready for the show of a lifetime. Sure enough, the acts and feats of the performers live up to the hype. There were clowns juggling chainsaws, acrobats swinging over spikes and even a ringleader commanding savage animals to perform tricks. This really was worth the price of admission...or so you think.

After the final performance all of the circus people get back out for one final bow as red and black confetti erupts from behind the stands. You cheer and clap as they disappear one by one backstage and begin preparing for the next show. "That was fun." you say as you stand up to leave. "But that contract does have me a bit worried..."
143211.title: You Got What You Wanted...

choices: Get a surprise phone call
Hear a knock at your door
Wake up inside the back of a limo
1432113.content:
You decide that a deal is a deal and stay put while you wait for the boss to show up like you promised. About ten minutes pass before everyone else has left the fairgrounds, leaving you all alone. You wait for five more minutes as the lights slowly begin dimming and are just about to walk back to your car when you hear a voice call out from behind you.

"My my...what a good girl you are. I thought for sure you would try to sneak out and yet here you are waiting for me patiently." The voice is smooth and silky, but also rugged and manly. It creeped you out, but also caught your interest. "Who are you, the boss?" you reply as you turn to face the person.

"That is correct, my dear." comes the reply as a tall man in an extremely fancy suit walks out of the shadows of the entrance to the circus tent. He had pitch black hair and porcelain white skin along with a thin stubble of facial hair. He wore a thick black coat over a black suit and red tie along with expensive dress shoes and a gold dress cane. On his head was a top hat that matched his suit and on his hands were stylish white dress gloves. Lastly, and somewhat oddly, he wore a pair of sunglasses even though it was almost too dark to see.

"I signed the contract and saw the show, what do I have to do?" you asked as the man took a few steps forward. "Nothing much, quite a bargain in fact for a show such as this." he replied as he twirled his cane. "Just a few jobs I need done. Complete them and you'll be free to go."

"Alright, let's get them over with." you say as you let out a sigh. The man merely grins as he walks over to your car and opens the door for you. "All in good time, my dear. You've no doubt had a long day and an exciting evening. I'll call you when I need you." he replies, never losing his pearly white smile or cheerful tone.

You shrug and climb into your car without a word. "And don't worry about your number, I'll have plenty of ways of contacting you when I need you." the man says as he gently closes the door and waves goodbye as you pull out of the fairgrounds. "Whatever weirdo." you mutter as you begin the drive home...

When tomorrow arrives you...
1432113.title: Meet The Boss

1442112.content:
"This cannot be happening," you try to reassure yourself as you twist the deadbolt latch into place and back away from the store entrance. That's when you notice the sleeve of your jacket wavering as if fluttering in a strong wind. This wouldn't have been an issue had you been standing with your feet in the waters of some Pacific Coast shoreline. However, the nearest beach was over 800 miles away from this small town. Upon closer inspection, you see that not only is the lower portion of your jacket sleeve glowing, now a bright florescent green, but it seems have come to life. You are surprised by the high pitched squeal that escapes your lips as you quickly remove the jacket and throw it across the floor. After all, you've always thought of yourself as a pretty tough girl before tonight.

"What the fuck is going on here?" you utter under your breath as you check the rest of your body for any signs of glowing ooze. You make your way to the back corner of the store, where a security camera is hidden by a large round mirror, never taking your eyes off the jacket. The mirror indicates no signs of green slime on your backside, but you look a little closer to be sure. That's when you see movement coming from your jacket's reflection. Without turning, you stand frozen, watching, as the glowing sleeve creeps like a caterpillar across the aisle, dragging the rest of the jacket with it, until it disappears behind a large bag of Doritos.

You quickly run over and grab your jacket before it can get very far and fold it up as best you can. It wiggles like crazy as you carry it back over to the counter and almost hops free, but your tight grip manages to hold it fairly still as you grab an empty cardboard box from behind the counter with your foot. "Jesus, this can't be happening... its too freaky..." You mumble as you open the box, stuff your rouge jacket inside and duct tape it shut with the roll laying under the counter. The box thrashes about a bit, but stays in place. "I don't know whats happening, but I have to do something..." You say as you wipe a few beads of sweat from your head. It seems one of those plant creatures knocked over a powerline somewhere nearby, causing the entire store to fall into near complete darkness. "Oh god, what now...?!" You groan as you stumble towards the front of the store and look out the window. A little further down the road you can see a telephone pole leaning on its side shooting sparks. "Great, now the damn powers out... I should have just stayed home tonight..." You try to think as you rub your throbbing forehead. You really didn't want to go outside, but it could be dangerous with the power out and you wouldn't be out there very long. "Okay, I can do this..." You say to yourself as you pull open the door slowly and take a quick look around with your flashlight. Aside from some movement off in the distance and a little in the nearby weeds it seemed like any other crisp clear night. After flickering for a second it turned green and the small device began humming to life with a soft whirling noise. "Oh, thank goodness... at least this works." you say exasperatedly as you wipe some sweat from your brow. "After tonight I think I'm gonna use up about a week of vacation days... or a month..."

You turn back towards the gas station and are relieved to see shadows cast into the parking lot from the restored power. If nothing else, at least you wouldn't be fumbling around in the dark. You run back around to the front of the gas station just in time to catch the impact of another meteor about a mile away in some field. Seconds later a few more glowing space rocks crashed into the nearby countryside. Some landed in fields, one splashed into a pond, one smashed the roof of a barn up the road and about half a dozen others sailed over the treetops and disappeared. "I can't believe I'm actually about to do this..." you whisper as you open the trunk of of your car and retrieve an emergency flare gun from the back along with some flares and a small pocket knife.

With a deep breath you step away from the parking lot and begin looking around the countryside surrounding you. Most of the impacts had been further away in the woods or in town but at least a few had occurred nearby. Up the road was a smashed up barn that belonged to a local farmer, off in the field behind the gas station was a pond with a fresh space rock deposit and just a short walk beyond that was an open field with a new crater in it.

145.content: After a few seconds of digging around in your purse you pull out your trusty Nintendo DS as well as a handful of games. You've played and beaten most of them several times by now, but it was better then sitting around with your thumb up your ass. After a few minutes of looking over the dozen or so cartridges on the counter you finally decide to play...
145.title: Gamer girl

choices: Call the police, whatever this is, its too dangerous to mess with!
Get the hell out of there before anyone comes along and sees what you've done!
That... WAS FUN! Let's see what else this puppy can do!
1452.content: You turn the game on and get ready to play, but instead of the title screen appearing all you can see is an areial view of the area surrounding the gas station on the top part and data readouts on the bottom. "What the hell...?" You whisper as your thumb accidentally hits one of the buttons and fires a preditor drone at a large tree across the street. A thunderous boom and firey explosion one second later tells you that this is no mere toy in your hands, not any more... "Second missle ready to fire." A computer voice announces as you stare at the devistation you just caused. "Oh my god..." You mutter to yourself as you look back down at the tiny screen.
1452.title: Death from above!

choices: Head home and try to figure out what just happened
Keep driving around town. Maybe an idea will come to you...
14522.content: Without another word you quickly turn the DS off and throw it back into your purse. "Oh my god... oh my god... what did I do... what did I do..." You mumble as you run outside, climb into your car, and drive away just as sirens begin sounding out in the distance. "Oh no... this is horrible! I'm going to be labeled a terrorist or something for this!" You groan as you try to calm yourself down. "I've gotta think... what's done is done, I can't change that... but what can I do now?"
14522.title: Screw this, I'm outta here!

choices: Go downstairs and see what he wants...
Try to sneak out the window
145221.content:
You pull into your driveway and quickly head up to your room while being careful not to wake your parents. All you need is some rest, tomorrow you'll probably just hear a story in the news about lighting striking a tree or something. Nothing to worry about, surely they can't trace this back to you. "I bet this is all just a dream anyway..." You say as you pull up the covers and slowly begin to fall asleep. "There isn't any way my DS is some kind of government experiment or something... I must have fallen alseep at the job. So long as I'm up before my boss checks in on me I'll be fine..." With that you close your eyes and drift off to sleep with your mind finally at ease. A bright light begins to shine into your room as a bird chirping outside wakes you up the next day. "Oh no... I'm at my house... last night really DID happen after all!" You say as you rub your tired eyes. "But no one came to our house last night... so they still shouldn't know about what I did. This'll all blow over soon enough..." Just then the doorbell rings downstairs and you hear the sound of a man introduce himself to your mother. "Good morning ma'am. I'm sorry to bother you at this hour, but I'd like to speak to your daughter, I'm from the FBI..."

Crap.
145221.title: You just need a little rest...

choices: Summon Cthulhu
Summon a jetpack
Summon a Starite
1453.content:
You had this game pretty much 100% beaten, but it was always fun to go back and try new solutions to the levels. You create a apple in the game only to hear a loud pop echo just above your head. You look up from your game as a ghostly apple hovered over the counter. "What in the...?" you stammer as you reach out to touch it.

Your hand goes right through it and it stays in place without moving in the slightest. You take a step back and look down at the screen of your game as it glowed softly. Then you get an idea. If you could summon an apple in the real world using the game maybe you could interact with it in the same way.

You grab the apple on the screen and place it on the ground next to an NPC and then look up at the apple hovering in the real world. With a soft pop it materializes and falls to the counter with a thud. It didn't look like a real apple though and was both cartoony and comically large in its appearance. "Wow..." you whisper as you look back down at the screen again. "I have the power to create anything I can think of!"
1453.title: Oh The Possibilities!

15.content: You begin to have second thoughts about working at a gas station and decide to try for a job at the local car wash. Unfortunately, as you are walking back to your car a semi swerves off the highway and hits you at nearly 95 mph, crushing your bones and sending your body flying through the gas stations front window. Seems you're back at the station after all, but you're in no condition to be working now...or living for that matter. Guess you shouldn't have tried to leave just yet, it's called Gas Station Attendant for a reason, you know...
15.title: Street pizza

info.brief_description: Your first day working at the local gas station is about to take an odd turn...
info.description:
A bright neon sign flickers just outside a lonely gas station on the edge of town. Cold beer, cheap cigarettes, stale chips... and endless possibilites for adventure. You thought your first shift at the new gas station would be nothing but a boring way to earn some extra cash...but by the end of the day you'll have earned much more then a measly minimum wage, that's for sure...


Rules

1. Adult content is allowed, just don't overdo it.

2. You may end the story, but try not to end it too early if you can avoid it.

3. If you plan on adding a chapter please put some effort into it. No one wants to go through 20 pages of story in five minutes.

4. Chapters with really poor grammer or that are just plain stupid will be edited or deleted. (I don't mind things like magic, aliens, or monsters. But really poor plot structure and hundreds of typos are pushing it...)

5. You can leave the gas station as long as you have a reason to do so. (Even if that reason is idiotic, poorly justified, or extremely likely to get you killed.)
